Detailed Description

cvmx_uahc::_usbsts

For information on this register, refer to the xHCI Specification, v1.0, section 5.4.2.

This register can be reset by IOI reset, or UCTL()_CTL[UAHC_RST], or UAHC()_GCTL[CORESOFTRESET], or UAHC()_USBCMD[HCRST], or UAHC()_USBCMD[LHCRST].
